features: Active noise reduction: The active noise reduction of Infurture noise reduction headphones Q1 allows you to stay focused, compare and react to external noises, and then use opposite signals to cancel them, bringing you crystal clear sound, reducing up to 90% The environmental noise mainly eliminates noise from aircraft engines, subways, car engines and crowded streets.

40 hours of playback time: up to 30 hours of listening in noise reduction mode, and up to 40 hours of listening in standard mode. Quickly charge for 10 minutes and you can listen for 2 hours. (Cancel ANC to save power when noise reduction is not needed)

Lightweight construction: Infurture Q1 active noise reduction headphones weigh only 7.2 ounces (204 grams). The memory foam earmuffs can gently fit your ears. The headband's rotating joint will automatically adjust the angle of the earmuffs to suit you.​​ The shape of the head to obtain a more comfortable and firmer fit.

USB-C Fast Charging Function for 40H Playtime: 10 minutes of charging can provide you with 2 hours of listening time. You can enjoy a noise-free world for up to 40 hours. Note: If you do not use Bluetooth Headphones, please turn off ANC to avoid power consumption.

Powerful bass effect: 40mm drivers can bring better bass. Infurtures active noise-cancelling surround ear headphones bring you crisp, powerful sound and quiet sound, which will help you enjoy music better. Extraordinarily silent listening to fully balanced bass and high-fidelity tones, with extraordinary clarity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Model: Infurture Q1 (BN801A) Main Feature High-resolution sound: Infurture Q1 active noise-canceling headphones have a 40mm driver that can reproduce treble up to 20kHz, providing full sound with excellent clarity. Active noise reduction: The active noise reduction of Infurture noise reduction headphones Q1 allows you to stay focused, compare and react to external noises, and then use opposite signals to cancel them, bringing you crystal clear sound, reducing up to 90% The environmental noise mainly eliminates noise from aircraft engines, subways, car engines and crowded streets. Clear calls: Enhanced sound pickup and noise reduction functions ensure that your voice can be heard clearly when using Infurture Q1 active noise-canceling headphones. 40 hours of playback time: up to 30 hours of listening in noise reduction mode, and up to 40 hours of listening in standard mode. Quickly charge for 10 minutes and you can listen for 2 hours. (Cancel ANC to save power when noise reduction is not needed) Lightweight construction: Infurture Q1 active noise reduction headphones weigh only 7.2 ounces (204 grams). The memory foam earmuffs can gently fit your ears. The headband's rotating joint will automatically adjust the angle of the earmuffs to suit you.​​ The shape of the head to obtain a more comfortable and firmer fit. Multi-point connection: Infurture Q1 Bluetooth headset can connect 2 devices at the same time. After device A is connected to the headset, disconnect it and enter the pairing mode to connect to device B. After device B is connected, open the Bluetooth interface of device A and reconnect the headset to complete the simultaneous connection of the two devices. （Note: When switching playback devices, you need to pause the current playback device first, and then play another device. The headset button controls the last playback device）

Dual Bluetooth Device Connect to your Devices wirelessly with Bluetooth 5.0 INFURTURE Noise Canceling Headphones have Bluetooth 5.0 technology, which supports a dual device connection. Stay connected to your phone while listening on your computer, too..Connect with your device via Bluetooth name: Q1(Please note: For TVs without built-in Bluetooth, a Bluetooth transmitter is required) USB-C Fast Charging 10 minutes of charging can provide 2 hours of listeningYou don't have to worry about the battery when you go out Bass Audio 40mm custom dynamic drivers reproduce music with rich detail and stunning clarity for an enhanced listening experience.

Crystal Clear Calls The microphone of Infurture Noise Canceling Headphones improves sound reception, ensuring that your voice on the other side is very clear. Soft and Comfortable This Noise Canceling Headphones can be worn for a long time without sweating or oppressing Two connection modes Q1 not only a Bluetooth headphone, but also a wired headphone, When run out of battery use the included cable, you can still enjoy favorite music.

notes: 1.For the best sound quality, noise reduction, and call experience, make sure that the left and right earmuffs are worn on the correct sides and form a tight seal around your ears. 2.When using Bluetooth to connect to the computer, the audio output device needs to be selected as infurture H2 for normal use of the microphone, and the effect of the microphone when connected to the computer may not be perfectly displayed 3.The playback time varies depending on the volume and audio content. Specification Impedance: 32Ω Driver (full frequency): 2 × 40mm Frequency response: 20Hz-20kHz Range: 10 m / 33 ft What's in the box Infurture Q1 Active Noise Cancelling Headphones USB-C data cable 3.5 mm AUX cable headphone bag User manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the gym
reviews.reviewText: Less is more. They look cheap and feel cheap and really are cheap — $20. But the beauty is on the inside. They work perfectly, nice USBC charging, instant sync to my AppleWatch music and workouts. They block all the fan noise, babble, clacking, and trash music in the gym.with no clutter: big help in focusing on my output. I don’t worry about them getting lost or stolen or wrecked. They are very light and comfortable while lifting/running, play forever, and my music is loud and clear. Almost wore them into the pool, forgetting they were on my head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice build and good sound quality. The headphones are very comfortable! The ANC works great, but you can still hear sounds. I honestly prefer that, because at least I am still aware of my environment and it’s less distracting. If you play soft music, then you’re good. I like that you can hear different instruments on different sides of your ear when you’re playing music. It’s probably good for gaming too. I will update this review for the battery life and how well it works in a couple of months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: I love these. So much. I can’t believe they were as affordable as they are. Here’s why I love these:1- Comfortable AF. Unmatched. I have to wear these all day for work and NEVER has the top of my head hurt after a long day and the earcups are like clouds. I wear glasses and these are the only pair that don’t cause the arms to dig in and hurt me behind the ears. Seal is quite good too2- ANC is crazy good for over ear headphones. I had no idea how badly I needed these for things like going through airports, malls, etc. the ANC is enough that it quiets a significant amount of noise that it helps me feel less overwhelmed yet I’m still able to hear people speaking at a regular volune (can’t make out the words usually though) so I still feel I’m aware enough of my surroundings that I’m not unsafe3- Audio is good. I’m not an expert but I have to listen to and transcribe dictations for work and our clients don’t always have the best audio quality (a lot of the audio is pretty terrible tbh). these headphones were a game changer for me work wise. The noise cancellation really helped in this aspect too3- impressed with battery life. If you’re not using mic these will go for days. I used to do video calls a lot tho and you’ll get about 3h on battery if you’re actively using the micBottom line: if you’re on a budget but want quality headphones just buy these. Seriously. I’m not often this impressed with products but these are truly so high quality and are at a very affordable price point. You won’t regret it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good budget over-ear headphones with ANC
reviews.reviewText: For the price ($30),.these headphones have great sound and are comfortable, even when I sweat. The noise cancelling function is OK, but far from the best. But for the price, they are adequate. I use them when working in the yard. The ANC is good enough to block the sound of the leaf blower, but not the riding lawnmower. Still, pretty good overall for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a review ofINFURTURE Q1 Active Noise Cancelling HeadphonesPurchased July, 2023---Overall impression:Noise cancel works well, with or without music.Sound quality is excellent, plenty of bass if desired.The included manual is minimal and not clear, though it is in many languages.=== Operation notes ===* Noise Cancel *Noise cancel mode can be turned on and off by itself or when paired using Bluetooth or when using the audio jack input.Push the switch on the front, the green light turns on.Not necessary to power up to use Noise Cancel.Noise Cancel works by itself, or with (audio jack or Bluetooth) audio input.* Power On / Bluetooth *Push the Power button for ~2 seconds to power up. Hear the "Power On" announcement. See the Blue light flashing. Shortly after hear the "Pairing" announcement. No problems pairing with cellphone, device shows up as "Q1" with a headphone icon. After pairing is complete, volume can be adjusted with the headset buttons or with the audio source app (they track). The Blue light flashes once every several seconds.* Power Off *Push the Power button for ~3 seconds to power down. Hear the "Power Off" announcement.* Audio Jack Input *If the audio jack is connected the behavior is different. Plug in audio source and hear audio immediately. No need to push the Power button. If the Power button is pushed, hear the "Power On" announcement. But no lights come on. Pushing the button again repeats the announcement, never hear a "Power Off" announcement. The volume buttons have no effect, level can only be adjusted with the source. Noise cancel can be enabled with audio jack input: push the button and observe the green light. Noise cancel works well with audio jack input.* End of Review *

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for budget headphones.
reviews.reviewText: Had them for a month. The ANC feature works well. Sound could be better. Overall good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not noise canceling
reviews.reviewText: Beware! When I ordered these, they were on discount for $49 and clearly labeled “noise canceling”. When they went into my Amazon cart they were reduced to $19, and when I opened them again from the cart to double check, they returned to the original page clearly labeled as “noise canceling”. These are NOT noise canceling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything about these headphones are great the ANC are better than the previous ones but they are lacking on the volume aspect, these are on the quieter side but the amazing ANC makes up for the quietness, I've used these in school and the gym, great in both ambiences, I will say these are also lighter than the previous model, overall great headphones

Excellent sound, amazing price, easy pairing, light, portable and comfortable. Sound cancellation works like a charm. Bought these to replace 2 different pairs of soundcore headphones which are crap by comparison.Buy these.
Ottimo prodotto soprattutto poiché l' ho pagato a metà prezzo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good sound quality and very comfortable, easy to set up and use, great value for money

reviews.reviewTitle: Better battery life than more expensive headsets
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered what I consider to be expensive headsets and the only difference I can tell is the battery life on these is better plus I like that the ANC is separate and can be turned off and on regardless of whether you turn the audio portion on or not. I saw in some reviews that people were turning the ANC off thinking they had turned the headset off and they saw significant battery drain. The ANC off/on is at the front ( a little weird ) and the Audio is the bottom button at the back. You just press and listen for power on or power off.Build:They are light and comfortable and they don't creak at the clamps for the earpieces like some other more expensive ones did, and that made me send them back.I really like the design of the earpieces that totally envelope my ears and result in no pain, a big plus for me. The new chemical smell didn't take long to disappear either since they aren't packaged in a case.The only Negative is, that I'm not quite sure how long the swivel/fold joints will hold up so for this price I will tape them into a non-folding or swiveling position and use them like that.Sound:I consider these to be comparable to more expensive ones - I wouldn't use them for mixing music but for daily listening to music they are fine. Highs /mids/Lows are clear and well separated.ANC:I'd say these are comparable to again much more expensive brands I've bought here. There isn't anything that will completely take out all the lows or midrange in the lower price range. I find I have to have music playing very low to drown out the small amount of dog barking or lawnmowers it doesn't quite cover. This is very important for my sanity - I can't stand constant or loud internal/external noise.Volume:I don't like music blazingly loud so these are just fine. I see in the description they are for kids as well so hearing can be easily damaged at loud volume - these protect that.Pairing:Works easily with my iPhoneI saw these pop up in suggestions on sale and decided to take a chance on them since I hadn't found anything I liked in a price range I was willing to spend and these are quite a bit below that and IMO they are really good! I'm glad I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I took a punt on this, based upon reviews, and wasn’t too worried, as it was not an expensive buy. It does offer active noise cancellation, though, and that’s what I was most interested in.I knew the headphones do look good, though, will fold well, are sturdy and sound good.All these points passed the test, straight out of the bat. I loved the depth of sound, which offers a great breadth of treble and bass, without hiss, pop, sputter, crackle or distortion.So I gave the ANC a test and it was weird - a slight pressure, almost as though I’d lifted off at speed, in an airplane - but boy, it worked! Not entirely, but about whirring fan subsided to a faint hum. Voices were almost entirely indistinct (and my family can be loud, believe me).This pair of headphones are worth easily double, possibly treble, what they cost me. I have rarely been so impressed! And they look great! Soft padding, over the head and over both ears - which were entirely covered by the good-sized oval-shaped cups (another deliberate reason for my purchase) - nice, easy-to-use, well-placed controls, and a lot more solid than I expected, considering how light they are.I could not recommend these more. For the price, they are insanely undervalued, and an easy no-brainer.If you are looking for a good pair of headphones - no make that a great pair of budget headphones - which have genuine and affective (not perfect, but very good, nonetheless) Active Noise Cancellation AND have great sound across the board AND outrageously good battery life, these are the ones for you.I’m going to be buying another pair for my son, next time he breaks the flimsy expensive and just as effective set of headphones I bought for him, last time (and they cost FIVE times as much as these!).One of my best Amazon buys in a long, long time.
